article.author: CIE Tours
article.title: The CIE Tours Difference
article.lead: CIE Tours has been the premier tour operator for Ireland and Britain vacations, with a 95% customer satisfaction rating earning a reputation for excellence rooted in its signature Irish hospitality since 1932. Their outstanding local tour directors are the heart and soul of any CIE Tours vacation.
